item.title: Grab 收购新加坡餐饮预订公司 Chope：英国电信
item.description: 据《商业时报》周一报道，Grab 控股有限公司收购了餐厅预订平台 Chope，收购金额未披露，并将接管其在新加坡、印度尼西亚和泰国的业务。【原文：Grab Holdings Ltd. has acquired restaurant reservation platform Chope for an undisclosed sum and will take over its operations in Singapore, Indonesia and Thailand, The Business Times reported on Monday.】

item.title: 阿美风险投资支持韩国人工智能芯片制造商反叛者公司
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）的风险投资部门向韩国芯片制造商 Rebellions Inc. 投资了 1500 万美元，以此推动沙特阿拉伯人工智能产业的发展。【原文：Saudi Aramco’s venture arm has invested $15 million in South Korean chipmaker Rebellions Inc. as part of a push to accelerate the AI industry in Saudi Arabia.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国股市在本周下跌后反弹哈里斯竞选活动在头24小时内筹集到8100万美元。美国将扩大在北极地区的军事准备和监视。【原文：Good morning. US stocks rebound after down week. Harris campaign raises $81 million in its first 24 hours. US to expand military readiness and surveillance in the Arctic. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 算法交易员加剧抛售，石油接近五周低点
item.description: 在追随趋势的商品交易顾问（CTA）引发连续下跌后，石油在五周低点附近企稳。【原文：Oil steadied near a five-week low after trend-following commodity trading advisers, or CTAs, spurred a run of losses.】

item.title: 花旗银行警告，如果欧元兑日元汇率 "威胁 "180，将面临干预风险
item.description: 据花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Japanese authorities might step into the market and sell the European common currency if euro-yen nears the 180 level, according to analysts at Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将跟随华尔街反弹：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市将追随华尔街的反弹走势，投资者的目光将从乔-拜登结束连任竞选转向科技财报季的开始。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set to track a rebound on Wall Street as investors looked beyond Joe Biden ending his reelection campaign to focus on the start of the tech earnings season.】

item.title: 象征中国信贷泡沫破灭的香港塔
item.description: 2017 年香港出售中心摩天大楼时，创纪录的 52 亿美元标价让投资者不得不组成财团，以获得多数股权并分割楼层。这一决定正迅速成为一块磨刀石。【原文：When The Center skyscraper was sold in Hong Kong in 2017, the record $5.2 billion price tag was so high that investors had to form a consortium to take a majority stake and divvy up the floors. That decision is rapidly becoming a millstone.】

item.title: 南非改革促使货币基金经理 Abax 提高风险敞口
item.description: 资产管理公司 Abax Investments Ltd. 受总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）经济改革计划的鼓舞，增加了对南非股票的投资。【原文：Asset manager Abax Investments Ltd. has increased exposure to South African equities, encouraged by President Cyril Ramaphosa’s economic-reform plans, but warned that investors would want to see results before getting too excited.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会将批准以太币现货 ETF，这是加密货币发展的最新里程碑
item.description: 美国监管机构批准了首批直接投资于全球第二大加密货币以太币的交易所交易基金，这是对价值 2.4 万亿美元的数字资产行业的最新推动。【原文：US regulators were seen approving the first exchange-traded funds that invest directly in Ether, the world’s second-largest cryptocurrency, in the latest boost to the $2.4 trillion digital-asset industry.】

item.title: Golub 牵头为 TA 分割业务提供 10 亿美元私人信贷交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Golub Capital 主导了约 10 亿美元的私人债务融资，以支持 TA Associates 收购从 Community Brands 分拆出来的 Momentive Software。【原文：Golub Capital led a roughly $1 billion private debt facility to support TA Associates acquisition of Momentive Software, a carveout from Community Brands, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 佩尔茨的特里安集团建立 3M 分拆公司 Solventum 的股份制
item.description: 激进投资者纳尔逊-佩尔茨（Nelson Peltz）的特里安基金管理公司（Trian Fund Management）已在 3M 公司的医疗保健衍生公司 Solventum Corp.【原文：Activist investor Nelson Peltz’s Trian Fund Management has amassed a stake in 3M Co.’s health-care spinoff Solventum Corp.】

item.title: 西方石油公司欲用 50 亿美元高额债务收购皇冠岩石公司
item.description: 西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum Corp. ）正在向投资者征集债券销售方案，预计总额约为 50 亿美元，用于资助其对德克萨斯州页岩钻探商 CrownRock LP 的收购。【原文：Occidental Petroleum Corp. is sounding out investors for a bond sale that is expected to total around $5 billion to help fund its takeover of Texas shale driller CrownRock LP.】

item.title: 富国银行称，无论谁在美国大选中获胜，都将面临公共财政减税风险
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）的首席市政债券策略师维克拉姆-拉伊（Vikram Rai）说，无论谁在 11 月份的美国大选中获胜，州政府和地方政府出售的债券的免税地位都可能岌岌可危。【原文：Wells Fargo & Co.’s head muni strategist Vikram Rai says the tax-exempt status of bonds sold by state and local governments could be in jeopardy regardless of who wins the US elections in November.】

item.title: 巴西将 2024 年预算赤字预期上调至 52 亿美元
item.description: 根据巴西政府周一公布的最新估计，2024 年底巴西将出现 288 亿雷亚尔（52 亿美元）的基本财政赤字，相当于国内生产总值的 0.25%。【原文：Brazil will end 2024 with a primary fiscal deficit of 28.8 billion reais ($5.2 billion), equivalent to 0.25% of gross domestic product, according to new government estimates published on Monday.】

item.title: 激进主义者英达巴公司获得英联邦公司股份
item.description: 据彭博新闻社查阅的一封信称，激进投资者 Indaba Capital Management 已持有写字楼房地产投资信托 Equity Commonwealth 的股份。【原文：Activist investor Indaba Capital Management has amassed a stake in office real estate investment trust Equity Commonwealth, according to a letter reviewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 世贸组织成员推动加快奥孔乔-伊韦拉连任进程
item.description: 世界贸易组织相当一部分成员支持非洲国家集团推动总干事恩古齐-奥孔乔-伊维拉（Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala）加快竞选第二个四年任期的举动。【原文：A sizable portion of World Trade Organization members supported a move from a group of African countries pushing for Director-General Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala to expedite a run for a second four-year term.】

item.title: T.罗尔-普莱斯认为蓝色债券市场有望增长
item.description: T.罗尔-普莱斯集团公司（T Rowe Price Group Inc.【原文：T. Rowe Price Group Inc. is targeting a corner of the sustainable debt market that it sees growing fast over the next decade: blue bonds.】

item.title: AMC 利用影院支持交易重组债务负担
item.description: 据知情人士透露，AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. 已与债权人达成协议，要求重组其债务，并将美国的影院转移到公司的另一个部门。【原文：AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. has reached an agreement with creditors that calls for restructuring its debt and moving US theaters into a different unit of the company, according to people with knowledge of the plans.】

item.title: 杠杆融资市场一扫夏季低迷，交易接连不断
item.description: 随着收购融资的增加，以及借款人在市场保持弹性和融资便宜的情况下寻求重新定价等机会性交易，杠杆贷款的发行量正在刷新夏季记录。【原文：Leveraged loan issuance is setting new summer records as buyout financing amps up and borrowers pursue opportunistic transactions like repricings while the market remains resilient and financing is cheap.】

item.title: 秘密买家为被抛弃的阿尔法-尼禄（Alfa Nero）超级游艇支付 4000 万美元
item.description: 被遗弃在加勒比海两年多的 Alfa Nero 超级游艇有了新主人。【原文：The Alfa Nero superyacht, which has been abandoned in the Caribbean for more than two years, has a new owner.】

item.title: 债券市场关注数据和美联储，特朗普交易陷入停滞
item.description: 随着副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）在民主党中获得支持，债券交易员们正在重新评估所谓的特朗普交易，权衡政治动荡与即将公布的新经济数据以及未来美国利率走势。【原文：Bond traders are reassessing so-called Trump trades as Vice President Kamala Harris gathers support among Democrats, weighing the political shakeup against upcoming fresh economic data and the path of US interest rates ahead.】

item.title: 克莱尔莱克公司支持的盲人制造商看到竞争对手的债权人囤积债务
item.description: 华尔街公司正争先恐后地处理威斯康星州一家名不见经传的窗帘生产商的债务，为一场潜在的重组之战做准备，而这场重组之战很可能会让他们彼此对立。【原文：Wall Street firms are racing to corral the debt of a little-known Wisconsin window covering producer in preparation for a potential restructuring fight that’s likely to pit them against each other.】

item.title: 债务期限临近，TDR 面临失去对邮轮运营商海达路德控制权的风险
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，如果挪威游轮运营商海达路德集团（Hurtigruten Group AS）未能在8月底之前为其明年到期的债券进行再融资，TDR Capital LLP公司将面临失去对该公司控制权的风险。【原文：TDR Capital LLP risks losing control of Norwegian cruise line operator Hurtigruten Group AS if the company fails to refinance its bond due next year by the end of August, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟分拆令 410 亿美元债券面临 "垃圾 "风险
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）称，如果华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery Inc.【原文：There are $41 billion of Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. bonds that could fall out of investment-grade territory if the media company decides to spin off its namesake movie studio and streaming businesses, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 中断为做空者带来 4.61 亿美元暴利
item.description: 周五，CrowdStrike Holdings Inc.的软件更新失败引发全球IT故障，股价大跌，创下自2022年11月以来最糟糕的一天，这让押注该公司的做空者得到了回报。【原文：Short sellers piling into bets against CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. were rewarded Friday when a botched software update from the firm sparked a global IT outage and sent shares plunging to their worst day since November 2022.】

item.title: 破产的 Steward Health 在参议院调查中为两家医院找到买家
item.description: 破产的 Steward Health 表示已为其位于阿肯色州和路易斯安那州的两家医院找到了买家，这家美国最大的营利性医疗系统正准备接受参议院两党对其财务困境的调查。【原文：Bankrupt Steward Health said it found buyers for two of its hospitals in Arkansas and Louisiana, as the nation’s largest for-profit health system braces for a bipartisan Senate investigation into its financial woes.】

item.title: 波罗的海航空公司首席执行官称首次公开募股时间可能推迟到明年
item.description: 波罗的海航空公司（AirBaltic Corp AS）表示，随着整个行业对航空公司盈利能力的担忧加剧，该公司计划首次公开募股的时间可能会推迟到明年，具体取决于投资者的反馈。【原文：AirBaltic Corp AS said the timing for its planned initial public offering could slip into next year depending on investor feedback, as concerns mount across the industry about airlines’ profitability.】

item.title: 比特币 ETF 流入量在四周内突破 30 亿美元
item.description: CoinShares Ltd. 的数据显示，随着加密货币价格飙升至一个多月来的最高点，比特币投资产品上周吸金 12.7 亿美元。【原文：Bitcoin investment products took in $1.27 billion last week as the cryptocurrency surged to its highest price in more than a month, CoinShares Ltd. data show.】

item.title: 跨山输油管道在可能出售前权衡债务交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，跨山公司计划在加拿大政府最终出售这家石油管道运营商之前，在债券市场上借款，为其部分未偿债务进行再融资。【原文：Trans Mountain Corp. plans to borrow in the bond market to refinance some of its outstanding debt ahead of the Canadian government’s eventual sale of the oil pipeline operator, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 拜登离职敲响警钟：特朗普交易充满矛盾
item.description: 在预测和交易关键选举方面，华尔街的记录令人遗憾。现在，乔-拜登（Joe Biden）的退出颠覆了美国总统大选，根据最新的政治头条新闻进行投资的危险性也随之凸显出来。【原文：Wall Street has a sorry record trying to predict – and trade — pivotal elections at the best of times. Now as Joe Biden’s withdrawal upends the US presidential race, the danger of investing based on the latest political headlines has been thrown into sharp relief.】
